SELECT
'设备' as 'devName', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='搅拌传动部' AND SC_CONTENT LIKE '润滑%' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a1', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='搅拌传动部' AND SC_CONTENT LIKE '减速机%' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a2', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='搅拌传动部' AND SC_CONTENT LIKE '基座%' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a3', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='分配头部' AND SC_CONTENT LIKE '是否磨损%' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a4', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='刮刀部' AND SC_CONTENT LIKE '刮刀是否%' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a5', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='刮刀部' AND SC_CONTENT LIKE'刮刀与%' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a6', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='本体' AND SC_CONTENT = '温度' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a7', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='水封水' AND SC_CONTENT = '是否正常' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a8', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='计量酸泵' AND SC_CONTENT = '有无泄漏' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a9' FROM (SELECT SC_CONTENT,RESULT,SC_PART,devName, (CASE WHEN (ALTPID = 2 OR ALTPID=1) THEN '故障' WHEN (ALTPID = 0) THEN '正常' ELSE RESULT END ) as tempResult
FROM dxj_spot_result WHERE (DEPT_NAME="精尾设备" AND devName="2#TT-80陶瓷过滤机") AND to_days(TASKSTART_TM) = to_days(now())-- 当天数据 )as tmp

SELECT '生产' as 'devName', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='主轴电机' AND SC_CONTENT='温度' THEN temResult end ) as 'a1', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='主轴电机' AND SC_CONTENT='震动' THEN temResult end ) as 'a2', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='主轴电机' AND SC_CONTENT='螺栓是否紧固' THEN temResult end ) as 'a3', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='主轴电机' AND SC_CONTENT='是否加油润滑' THEN temResult end ) as 'a4', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='主轴减速机' AND SC_CONTENT='温度' THEN temResult end ) as 'a5', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='主轴减速机' AND SC_CONTENT='震动' THEN temResult end ) as 'a6', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='主轴减速机' AND SC_CONTENT='螺栓是否紧固' THEN temResult end ) as 'a7', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='主轴减速机' AND SC_CONTENT='油液是否达标' THEN temResult end ) as 'a8', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='主轴减速机' AND SC_CONTENT='是否漏油' THEN temResult end ) as 'a9', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='主轴轴承' AND SC_CONTENT='震动' THEN temResult end ) as 'a10', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='主轴轴承' AND SC_CONTENT='连接是否紧固' THEN temResult end ) as 'a11', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='主轴轴承' AND SC_CONTENT='是否加油润滑' THEN temResult end ) as 'a12', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='搅拌电机' AND SC_CONTENT='温度' THEN temResult end ) as 'a13', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='搅拌电机' AND SC_CONTENT='震动' THEN temResult end ) as 'a14', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='搅拌电机' AND SC_CONTENT='螺栓是否紧固' THEN temResult end ) as 'a15', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='搅拌电机' AND SC_CONTENT='是否加油润滑' THEN temResult end ) as 'a16',
MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='搅拌器轴承' AND SC_CONTENT='震动' THEN temResult end ) as 'a17', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='搅拌器轴承' AND SC_CONTENT='连接是否紧固' THEN temResult end ) as 'a18', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='搅拌器轴承' AND SC_CONTENT='是否加油润滑' THEN temResult end ) as 'a19', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='循环水泵电机' AND SC_CONTENT='温度' THEN temResult end ) as 'a20', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='循环水泵电机' AND SC_CONTENT='震动' THEN temResult end ) as 'a21', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='循环水泵电机' AND SC_CONTENT='螺栓是否紧固' THEN temResult end ) as 'a22', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='循环水泵电机' AND SC_CONTENT='是否加油润滑' THEN temResult end ) as 'a23'
FROM ( SELECT devName,SC_CONTENT,SC_PART, ( CASE
WHEN (ALTPID = 2 OR ALTPID=1) THEN '故障' WHEN ALTPID=0 THEN '正常' ELSE RESULT END -- )temResult from dxj_spot_result where DEPT_NAME='精尾生产' AND devName='2#TT-80陶瓷过滤机'
)as tmp

SELECT '电仪' as 'devName', MAX(CASE WHEN devName='2号过滤搅拌电机' AND SC_CONTENT ='测振' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a1', MAX(CASE WHEN devName='2号过滤搅拌电机' AND SC_CONTENT ='测温' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a2', MAX(CASE WHEN devName='2号过滤搅拌电机' AND SC_CONTENT ='有无异响' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a3', MAX(CASE WHEN devName='2号过滤搅拌电机' AND SC_CONTENT ='有无松动' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a4', MAX(CASE WHEN devName='2号过滤主轴电机' AND SC_CONTENT ='测振' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a5', MAX(CASE WHEN devName='2号过滤主轴电机' AND SC_CONTENT ='测温' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a6', MAX(CASE WHEN devName='2号过滤主轴电机' AND SC_CONTENT ='有无异响' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a7', MAX(CASE WHEN devName='2号过滤主轴电机' AND SC_CONTENT ='有无松动' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a8' FROM ( SELECT SC_CONTENT,devName, (CASE WHEN (ALTPID = 2 OR ALTPID=1) THEN '故障' WHEN (ALTPID = 0) THEN '正常' ELSE RESULT END ) as tempResult
FROM dxj_spot_result WHERE (DEPT_NAME="电仪工段" AND (devName='2号过滤搅拌电机' OR devName='2号过滤主轴电机')) AND to_days(TASKSTART_TM) = to_days(now())-- 当天数据 )as temp
